</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''cameraEffectEnableHUD''' enable </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
